title: solr/example/solr-webapp included in git checkin
description:
I tried checking in /solr and /lucene without doing an 'ant clean'. It included solr/example/solr-webapp and data directories in solr/example.

Is it intended to support checking in without a clean? After all, solr/build and lucene/build and other artifacts are proscribed.

I think the top-level .gitignore should include solr/example/solr-webapp.
